content: We will begin today's call with Lori Woods, Isoray's Chief Executive Officer; and then Jonathan Hunt, Isoray's Chief Financial Officer; who will discuss the fiscal third quarter 2022 financial results. Good afternoon, and thank you for joining us today for Isoray's fiscal third quarter 2022 earnings conference call for the quarter ended March 31, 2022. Revenue for the third quarter ended March 31, 2022 grew 12% to a record $2.91 million versus $2.60 million for the same period last year. Total operating expenses consisting of research and development, sales and marketing and general and administrative increased 32% to $2.82 million versus $2.13 million in the third quarter of 2021. Please pose your question. Your line is live. Please pose your question. Your line is live. Please pose your question. Your line is live. Please pose your question. Your line is live.
